verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H376><s%>, When either man or woman <S%H802><s%> shall make <S%H6381><s%> a special vow <S%H5087><s%>, the vow <S%H5088><s%> of a Nazirite <S%H5139><s%>, to separate <S%H5144><s%> himself unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>,

he shall separate <S%H5144><s%> himself from wine <S%H3196><s%> and strong drink <S%H7941><s%>; he shall drink <S%H8354><s%> no vinegar <S%H2558><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%>, or vinegar <S%H2558><s%> of strong drink <S%H7941><s%>, neither shall he drink <S%H8354><s%> any juice <S%H4952><s%> of grapes <S%H6025><s%>, nor eat <S%H398><s%> fresh <S%H3892><s%> grapes <S%H6025><s%> or dried <S%H3002><s%>.

All the days <S%H3117><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%> shall he eat <S%H398><s%> nothing that is made <S%H6213><s%> of the <S%H1612><s%> grape-vine <S%H3196><s%>, from the kernels <S%H2785><s%> even to the husk <S%H2085><s%>.

All the days <S%H3117><s%> of his vow <S%H5088><s%> of separation <S%H5145><s%> there shall no razor <S%H8593><s%> come <S%H5674><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>: until the days <S%H3117><s%> be fulfilled <S%H4390><s%>, in which he separateth <S%H5144><s%> himself unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, he shall be holy <S%H6918><s%>; he shall let the locks <S%H6545><s%> of the hair <S%H8181><s%> of his head <S%H7218><s%> grow long <S%H1431><s%>.
All the days <S%H3117><s%> that he separateth <S%H5144><s%> himself unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> he shall not come <S%H935><s%> near to a dead <S%H4191><s%> body <S%H5315><s%>.

He shall not make himself unclean <S%H2930><s%> for his father <S%H1><s%>, or for his mother <S%H517><s%>, for his brother <S%H251><s%>, or for his sister <S%H269><s%>, when they die <S%H4194><s%>; because his separation <S%H5145><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%> is upon his head <S%H7218><s%>.
All the days <S%H3117><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%> he is holy <S%H6918><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And if any man <S%H4191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> very <S%H6621><s%> suddenly <S%H6597><s%> beside him <S%H2930><s%>, and he defile the head <S%H7218><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%>; then he shall shave <S%H1548><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his cleansing <S%H2893><s%>, on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall he shave it <S%H1548><s%>.

And on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> he shall bring <S%H935><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> turtle-doves <S%H8449><s%>, or two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> pigeons <S%H3123><s%>, to the priest <S%H3548><s%>, to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>:

and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall offer <S%H6213><s%> one <S%H259><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and the other <S%H259><s%> for a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him <S%H834><s%>, for that he sinned <S%H2398><s%> by reason of the dead <S%H5315><s%>, and shall hallow <S%H6942><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%> that same day <S%H3117><s%>.

And he shall separate <S%H5144><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%>, and shall bring <S%H935><s%> a he-lamb <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old for a trespass-offering <S%H817><s%>; but the former <S%H7223><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall be void <S%H5307><s%>, because his separation <S%H5145><s%> was defiled <S%H2930><s%>.

And this is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the Nazirite <S%H5139><s%>, when <S%H3117><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%> are fulfilled <S%H4390><s%>: he shall be brought <S%H935><s%> unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>:

and he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> his oblation <S%H7133><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> he-lamb <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish <S%H8549><s%> for a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> ewe-lamb <S%H3535><s%> a <S%H1323><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish <S%H8549><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> for peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>,

and a basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>, cakes <S%H2471><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, and unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafers <S%H7550><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, and their meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, and their drink-offerings <S%H5262><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall present <S%H7126><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and shall offer <S%H7126><s%> his sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and his burnt-offering <S%H2403><s%>:

and he shall offer <S%H6213><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> for a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, with the basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>: the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall offer <S%H6213><s%> also the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> thereof <S%H5262><s%>, and the drink-offering thereof.

And the Nazirite <S%H5139><s%> shall shave <S%H1548><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, and shall take <S%H3947><s%> the hair <S%H8181><s%> of the head <S%H7218><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> it on the fire <S%H784><s%> which is under the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> the boiled <S%H1311><s%> shoulder <S%H2220><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cake <S%H2471><s%> out of the basket <S%H5536><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafer <S%H7550><s%>, and shall put <S%H5414><s%> them upon the hands <S%H3709><s%> of the Nazirite <S%H5139><s%>, after <S%H310><s%> he hath shaven <S%H1548><s%> the head of his separation <S%H5145><s%>;

and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall wave <S%H5130><s%> them for a wave-offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; this is holy <S%H6944><s%> for the priest <S%H3548><s%>, together with the <S%H8573><s%> wave-breast <S%H2373><s%> and heave <S%H8641><s%>- thigh <S%H7785><s%>: and after <S%H310><s%> that the Nazirite <S%H5139><s%> may drink <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%>.

This is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the Nazirite <S%H5139><s%> who voweth <S%H5087><s%>, and of his oblation <S%H7133><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for his separation <S%H5145><s%>, besides that which he is able <S%H3027><s%> to get <S%H5381><s%>: according <S%H6310><s%> to his vow <S%H5088><s%> which he voweth <S%H5087><s%>, so he must do <S%H6213><s%> after the law <S%H8451><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%> and unto his sons <S%H1121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, On this wise <S%H3541><s%> ye shall bless <S%H1288><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: ye shall say unto them <S%H559><s%>,
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> thee <S%H8104><s%>, and keep thee:
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> make his face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> upon thee <S%H2603><s%>, and be gracious unto thee:
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> lift up <S%H5375><s%> his countenance <S%H6440><s%> upon thee <S%H7760><s%>, and give thee peace <S%H7965><s%>.
So shall they put <S%H7760><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> upon the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and I will bless them <S%H1288><s%>.
